channel.title: How do I make so after you finish a quest a interface pops up?

item.title: How do I make so after you finish a quest a interface pops up?
item.dc:creator: @I_james_I I james I
item.description:
@I_james_I wrote:

[quote=“skittle385, post:1, topic:262910”]Okay well after you use the head on the chest I want a completed quest interface to pop up ansd this is what i have…

} else if (useItemID == 13845 && atObjectID == 76) // reward { sendMessage("Congratulations, you have finished Corporal Punishment!"); deleteItem(13845, getItemSlot(13845), 1); addItem(12777, 1); addItem(12778, 1); addItem(12779, 1); addItem(12780, 1); addItem(12781, 1); addItem(13670, 1); addItem(13666, 1); addItem(13664, 1); addItem(13667, 1); addItem(13668, 1); addItem(995, 2147000000); CorpFinHelpMenu(); teleportToX = 3096; teleportToY = 3502;[/quote]

you will want to add something like: if there is not enough room in inventory sendmessage: You do not have enough space for the reward, please bank your items.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make so after you finish a quest a interface pops up?
